Question
========
A research project assesses Netflix viewing time (measured in minutes per day) and conducted a random sample among the Dutch population (N = 500). In this sample, the mean 90 minutes per day and the standard deviation 22 minutes per day.  
  
If we assume a normal distribution (*normal distribution*) and use the Empirical Rule, we can say that approx.

Answerlist
----------
* 68% of the observations are between 24 and 156 minutes.
* 68% of observations are between 46 and 134 minutes.
* 68% of the observations are between 68 and 112 minutes.
* 68% of observations are between 89 and 91 minutes.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* True
* False
